query:
SELECT e.id, e.tipoEvento, e.local as localId, l.nome as localNome
FROM eventos e
LEFT JOIN locais l ON e.local = l.id
WHERE e.turmaId = (SELECT id FROM turmas WHERE codigo = '654')
ORDER BY e.tipoEvento;
command:
